reviewText: Speedy and securely packaged shipment. Very pleased. Thank you!

I have learned how to read faces! I had first bought the book, Your Face Tells All and thoroughly enjoyed it. Then I saw there was a dvd he also made. The Your Face Tells All dvd is by far the best to date and was far more comprehensive than others. Easy for me to follow and understand, definitely a great learning tool!
I strongly recommend getting the book and dvd as they really compliment each other.

[...]

Moves very, very slow. Tests your patience to the max. Amazing Face Reading: An Illustrated Encyclopedia for Reading Faces Check out Mac Fulfer's book "Amazing Face Reading." You'll find out all that's in this video and more in at least half the time.
